title: Understanding Polymer Analysis
text: When polymers are exposed to heat, their structure can change. This can affect their physical properties, such as strength and flexibility. To study these changes, a specific type of analysis is required.

title: Types of Analysis
text: There are different types of analysis used in chemistry: qualitative, quantitative, characterization, and fundamental. Each serves a different purpose.

title: Characterization Analysis
text: Characterization analysis is used to study the structure and properties of materials. It helps in understanding how materials behave under different conditions, such as heat.

title: Choosing the Right Analysis
text: Based on the need to study structural changes in polymers due to heat, which type of analysis should be used?
